alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 8:22PM CST until January 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. Temperatures in the teens and 20s will result in freezing fog in some locations. * WHERE...In Kansas, Phillips and Rooks Counties. In Nebraska, Dawson, Furnas, Gosper, Harlan, and Phelps Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Freezing fog may result in a light glaze of ice on surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Surfaces may become slick due to a light glaze of ice from freezing fog. Be prepared for slick surfaces.
